updates.update_userinfo: I need your help… PLUS: Brand-new Tyrell art, a BEEF BROS review, and a Kickstarter from a stalwart BEEFER!
updates.update_content:
Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters, allow me to get down to brass tacks: Chris Moreno and my Kickstarter for the anti-gentrification kung fu comic Stoned Master is six days from completion and we're still $2,000 shy of our goal.
I say this not to guilt or coerce you but, rather, for your benefit! The truth is, if you miss out on Stoned Master, you're going to regret it. Why? Because if you loved BEEF BROS, you're going to flip for StonedMaster.
That's because StonedMaster has everything you love about BEEF BROS. Community-based leftist politics? Gonzo genre work? Big laughs? Incredible action? Premium printing? It's all there! While it's true that the art is different on , it's not one iota less gorgeous. Look at what Chris is getting up to on these pages!

updates.update_userinfo: Why BEEFERS should back Stoned Master. PLUS: A shipping update and a BEEFER photo gallery!
updates.update_content: Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters, I am pleased as punch to inform you that after a grueling ten-day sprint, I have successfully packed and mailed BEEF BROS to all BEEFERS! If you haven't received a tracking number via email, you might not have filled out your survey by the time I downloaded the backer report. But not to worry! I'm diving right back in to handle the remaining shipments. First, however…

updates.update_userinfo: BEEF BROS shipping now! Plus: STONED MASTER!
updates.update_content: Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters, WHAT. A. WEEK. As many of you are already aware, from shipping alerts, seeing BEEFERS post photos on social media, and actually getting it your hot little hands: BEEF BROS is currently shipping worldwide! And, as if that wasn't exciting enough, I have a brand-new Kickstarters launching today for Stoned Master! Details on BEEF BROS fulfillment progress, Stoned Master, Tyrell's latest book, my newest Dark Horse comic Savage Hearts, and Tales to Enlighten, another Kickstarter you should absolutely be supporting, down below!

updates.update_userinfo: THE BEEF BROS ARE ALMOST HERE!
updates.update_content: Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters, you have been so incredibly patient and I know exactly how difficult that is because – believe me when I say this – no one is more excited about BEEF BROS than the BEEF BROS team. Fortunately, it won't be much longer before you have the most bodacious superhero comic in this or any other galaxy in your hot little BEEFER hands! Right now we're putting the final touches on some production elements and then it's off the printer. Taylor already finished the letters; here's a sneak peek!

Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters, before I get into our update, please, if you haven't already, fill out your backer survey! We need your information to send out backer rewards!
Speaking of which, while we lost a bit of time due to COVID-19, we're now charging toward the finish line. If you get us your details, we should still be on track for our April delivery, or extremely close to it!
Ergo, please make any changes to your address by April 1, 2021. No fooling!

Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters! I'm back in your inboxes to give you, the BEEFERS, an update on the production of the biggest, brightest, beefiest superhero comic in all of space and time...BEEF BROS #1!
But first, and crucially, please fill out your backer survey so I can get you your copy of BEEF BROS as soon as possible. Even with Tyrell and his family triumphantly battling COVID-19 late last year, the entire team has kicked things into overdrive and we're looking good for our April delivery!

updates.update_userinfo: BEEF BROS thumbnails helped me gain 12.6 pounds of muscle!
updates.update_content:
Brothers, sisters, and gender resisters, we are back! Happy belated holidays and New Year and thank you for your patience as we work to make BEEF BROS #1 unlike any comic book you've ever read, the kind of comic book that BEEFERS deserve!
I've been trying to stay out of your hair but I just had to reach out because Brother Tyrell sent over his first batch of BEEF BROS thumbnails (BEEFNAILS?) and, after looking at them, I gained 12.6 pounds of lean muscle mass. But before I tell you this incredible tale…

It's appropriate that the BEEF BROS campaign is ending on Thanksgiving morning because I have so very much to be thankful for. I'm thankful for crushing our funding goal in our first five days; never was it in doubt that we'd get to make BEEF BROS #1. I'm thankful that we sailed right through our STRETCH GOAL, ensuring that everyone on the team can get a raise and I can get a page rate. But even more than the dollars raised, I'm thankful for another, far more important number: The amount of backers.
More than 1,500 people decided that they're tired of corporate-owned supercops; that they want superheroes who protect people from institutions, not the other way around; and that they were willing to put their money where their mouths were and BACK THE BEEF. Together, we're not only funding ethically and equitably produced superhero comics with politics we can be proud of, we're building something larger: the BEEF BROS MOVEMENT.

updates.update_userinfo: BEEF BROS Day 29: Only hours remain!
updates.update_content:
If you can't wait to get to the ENGAGEMENT, scroll down to the comments and answer me this question: What are you going to do with yourself between now and April while you wait for BEEF BROS #1!?
By any reasonable definition, we did it: BEEF BROS #1 was funded in only five days, we've built a movement of more than 1,300 BEEFERS, garnering mainstream attention and sustained buzz, and it's all because of you, your kindness, your generosity, your enthusiasm. It's because of the BEEF BROS ETHOS and the BEEF BROS MOVEMENT. But we're not done yet!

campaign.story:
Music in the video: “Escape Artist” by Zoe Keating - (https://music.zoekeating.com/track/escape-artist)

Promo Art/Cover with title - 11x17" Acrylics.
 RDW – A Tale of Lost Fantasy – By Marco Rudy
“RDW” is a tale about coping. Coping with loss, responsibility, command, addiction, withdrawal and more. It also features social commentary, PTSD, corporate interests and much more, in a Dark Fantasy setting – all of that, in a striking visual package.
It is Asterix – Mister Robot – Samurai Champloo - The Witcher books, Promethea and the game GRIS, rolled into One.
Its as if the harsh reality of real life problems were informed by a world with Dragons and Spell-casting. Sometimes this can be the solution to all our problems and sometimes it can be the sole cause for them. In this particular case, we're stuck in the middle, with Astrid, our protagonist, not knowing where to turn.
Finished Page 01 - Acrylics on 11x17" paper - Notice the layout attempts and process ideas, on the border ;)
Finished Page 02 - Acrylics on 11x17" paper - sequence progression and process ideas, at the top ;)
Finished Page 03 - Acrylics on 11x17" paper
Finished Page 04 - Acrylics on 11x17" paper - More sequence process progress at the top ;)
Yet another page finished - all in glorious 11x17" Traditional Acrylics
Rdw is also a story about a journey. A journey of acceptance, and how the world reflects our inner behavior. And while the journey will take us to dark places and subjects, it will also feature a world ripe with stories and folklore not often seen, like Mozambican, Brazilian, First Nations of the Americas, and much more. It is my opportunity to shine a light one these, as much as I do the protagonists story. 
The book follows Astrid, a free-company commander, a Leader currently without an army, her struggle with addiction to the enhancing drug that makes her Free-Company unique and the burden of leadership.  
The drug acts as some sort of juiced-up methamphetamine - the story will be delving deep into the effects the drug has on the body, the mind and the social circles, of those affect by it.
Along the way she’ll interact with different characters, settings, ideas and views and it is THAT interaction – how the world and her companions react to Astrid – what this story will be focusing on.
As the story goes  and  develops, on further books, we will navigate issues of mental health, discrimination, corruption, neo-colonialism, to name a few. 
The World, this setting, is as much a protagonist as Astrid. Riddled with Living Forests, Mythical creatures (from African, South-American, European Lore), Magic-lead Corporations and warring Nations, we get a glimpse of all that and more, through the eyes of a troubled addict.
The initial idea behind "Tales of Lost Fantasy" is to create a world a living, breathing world in which Fantasy and folklore walk together with “real life stories” and through which we use metaphor, humor, different cultures folklore and pop-culture to tell stories about past, current and future society, about escapism, about friendship true and false, about love, true and false and focusing that nothing is ever so black-and-white as it seems. No love is truly immaculate and no evil is without reason or sometimes evil, at all.
This initial volume is but the beginning of our adventure.
While Volume One of RDW serves as a good entry point to the story  being told - it is a part of a bigger story, one i hope to continue, once this first volume is released. Our main character is a product of many realities, that of an Army officer, A leader, A friend, a child of an interracial couple, and an addict, in recovery. All these elements, and more, are discussed as the story goes, even if for this first volume we are introduced to her immediate quest: what happened to her troops, specifically what happened to Menhir - a rock Troll/Berserker - and just what Is happening to her.
 Kickstarter, as well as funding dreams and making ideas into realities, allows creators the opportunity to shed inhibitions about those ideas and put them to practice. In this particular case, shape a story in any way we chose to and grow our audience in a catered fashion, in complete and direct communication between creator and audience. I am beholden to you and no other interests and that suits me just fine.
This campaign will fund the execution of the project, editorial staff, Lettering, all the production, printing and shipping. This will allow me to fully dedicate myself to it and make it the best and most visually stunning it can be, without gig for bills distractions.
So far, this Volume One has its 40 pages of story fully written, with all of them pencilled and partially painted (4 pages finished). Further volumes are already in production, Vol2 fully written and pencilled (with 5 pages already painted)and Vol3 halfway through - 130 pencilled and written pages - with Lots more, to come. But our focus here is Volume One. I am spreading the production of the book in the span of a full year, which allows me to fully commit to Each page and Each step of the production, and you will be tagging along with me, with each step, with constant updates EVERY WEEK.

 My name is Marco Rudy and i need a cup of Tea.
Right, i am Marco. I am a Mozambican-turned-Canadian Comic Book Artist, Painter, Illustrator and off-beat Storyteller. I have been working in the comics industry, for the better part of 13 years now, with longer tenures at DC (Swamp Thing, Action comics, The Shield) and Marvel (Marvel Knights: Spiderman; Bucky Barnes: The Winter Soldier, Avengers, Uncanny X:Men), among others. I am mostly known for my use of traditional medium (watercolors and acrylics) and a very Non-traditional way of visual story-telling, in which the Layout, Design and Color palette of a page and sequence, tells the story in equal amount as that of the action in Each panel. I take my influences in my sleeve and i finally have the chance to tell a story which involves my reality as a Mixed-Race person, as Mozambican out of place, a creature of the world and a child of conflict, mixed in with the Art and folklore of those not often featured or seen, in these types of books.

A page from the Short Story that preceeds RDW - in this sequence both the action In the panels is interacting with the layout and panel bordering, with the action heating up and the layout not only made of the blood, resulting from the panle to panle action, But the this very layout somewhat being a Result of this very same action. The layout And the action in the sequence, both interacting, inviting the reader to see thee story, in a more dynamic way.
I've always been a storyteller. I grew up reading whatever book I could find and always re-imagining that very same story or creating similar stories, on paper, afterwards. I'd even go as far as retelling that very same story to my friends, or better yet, the one Friend, and family.
I'd create atmosphere and embellish everything I could, trying to make the most mundane things become fantastical.  And when power outages would happen in Maputo, where im from, it was my time to shine, by the candlelight and share in my weird adventures with them. On of the particular effects is that I would invite my captive audience to participate in the story being told. Interactivity in storytelling.
Throughout my years in this industry, i've developed a particular way of visual storytelling, in which a page, is much more than a sequence of panel, in which the action happens. The page layout, the color palette In the layout is conversing directly with the action In the panels and Inviting the reader to somehow participate in it. That interactivity in storytelling I mentioned.

 Taylor Esposito Words and VFX Merchant - Taylor Esposito is a comic book lettering professional and owner of Ghost Glyph Studios. A former staff letterer at DC and production artist at Marvel, he lettered titles such as Red Hood and The Outlaws, Constantine, Interceptor: Reactor, Friendo (Vault Comics), Exorsisters, Jook Joint (Image), and Babyteeth (Aftershock). Other publishers he has worked with include Line Webtoon (Caster, Backchannel) Dynamite (Battlestar Galactica, Red Sonja and Vampirella meet Betty and Veronica, Army of Darkness/Bubba Ho-Tep), and IDW (Scarlett’s Strike Force).
Kirsten Ann Thompson - Kirsten Thompson is a comic writer and editor based in the Pacific  Northwest. In addition to being the creator and writer of I AM HEXED,  she has been a consultant on such comics as Kim & Kim volume 2, a  staff writer at The MNT and her writing has also appeared in Teen Vogue,  Femsplain and Women Write About Comics.
Eric Trautmann - Eric is the book designer on Black Magick, The Old Guard, Lazarus and Lazarus: Risen for Image Comics, the softcover collections ofAtomic Roboand Real Science Adventuresfor IDW and the hardcover collections of those titles for Tesladyne, LLC and IDW. He co-authored several issues of Lazarus: X +66 with Greg Rucka and the DC/Vertigo original graphic novel Shooters (with Brandon Jerwa, illustrated by Steve Lieber). He has written  titles for DC Comics, including The Shield (drawn by Marco Rudy) as well  as Action Comics,J.S.A. vs. Kobra, and Checkmate. He wrote extended runs for Dynamite Entertainment, notably Red Sonja,Vampirella, and Flash Gordonas well as the Lady Rawhide: Sisters of the White Rose miniseries. He can be found online at www.erictrautmann.us and in person at his wife’s amazing comic shop, Olympic Cards & Comics in Lacey, Washington.

INCENTIVES!!
Im opening space for some AMAZING Artists to feature some of their art in RDW-Vol 01!! Different interpretations and renditions of characters and mood, featured in teh book, through the eyes and art of these Masters! This will serve as incentives for people to join in our little adventure as starting at 100 pledges and with each new 20 people pledging A new Pinup is unlocked in the book - and Everyone gets to have it.
We've already unlocked the first SEVEN Artists, already. Let's make it all the way, to have all TEN of them, in the book, at 600 Pledges!!

100 Pledges - Margaux Saltel
Margaux is an incrediubly talented French based artist with a Unique style, using traditional and digital medium to bring her evocative art to form.
120 Pledges - Eduardo "Hellatoons" Medeiros
Brazilian artist "Hellatoons" peculiar approach to characters and setting is something to behold. His work speaks volumes, with simple lines and mood setting.
140 Pledges - Djibril Morissette-Phan
From Noir themed imagery, to Fine-Arts, to super-hero comics, there is absolutely Nothing Djibril does not excel at.
160 Pledges - Danica "KariDrawz" Brine
Combining the influence of Manga imagery with "Comics" inking, Danica's work touches many facets of our industry in amazing fashion, be it energetic or peaceful imagery, like this one.
180 Pledges - "ABZ" - Abigail Jill Harding
Nobody does mood setting and eerie environs, combining it with Fantasy creatures, like ABZ. Just LOOK att his beauty. Amazing
200 Pledges - Mateus Santolouco
His body of work speaks for itself, his Ninja Turtles are second to none - his technique with ANY medium is astonishing and his artwork needs to be seen by everyone. Anything he does, he's superb.
220 Pledges - BenGal
Needs no introduction. French Super-star Bengal's work is just Amazing. Just that.
240 Pledges - Rafael Albuquerque
Multiple-award winning Rafa Albuquerque is..well. Everybody knows him. Unique storyteller, prolific artist, he just seems to continuously get better.
260 Pledges - Marguerite Sauvage
One of the more Unique styles in comics, currently, Marguerite's soft lines and amazing creations stand on their own. Nothing else looks like this.
280 Pledges - Nick Bradshaw
As immensely talented an Artist as can be. The amount of work put into each detail and composition for Each of Nick's pieces, is second to none.
300 Pledges - To Be Announced

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I understand that you're taking a leap of faith, in trusting me to deliver something, in the span of a year, but i am easily contactable and ill make sure to be consistent in updating backers on progress and every step of production, till the book is done, printed and shipping starts. Digital copies will be delivered as soon as the funds are cleared by Kickstarter. The print edition will go into production when the Kickstarter ends and we know how many copies need to be printed. Fulfillment will happen as soon as the printer delivers the books. Rewards will be shipped by the end of August if all goes as planned. Thank you for all of your support. I understand that postal offices are currently affected by one too many factors, but we'll try to work a way to have everyone receive their piece, expediently.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
It's coming along nicely. SLow and steady, wins the race, innit? Hopefully it is so.
Enjoy yet another finished page ;)
Cheers!

M

Hello there, my friends!
I know that it has been roughly a month since my last update..it's just that this past scene was a bit intense, work-wise, so i decided that rather than showing a snippet here and there, id come to you, with a finished page of the sequence..so, here you have it.
Another month has past, another 4 pages done! Ill come back to you, in 4 weeks time, with yet another update, as we slowly and steadily progress unto 30 pages and then..10 pages will remain, to have it all painted!
Anyways, hope y'all doing well, here's a finished page, enjoy ;)

Yep. 
Today i scanned page 20, the middle point in this first book. So, yeah, we're half way thru the slowest part of the book - painting  the art.
Thus, i bring you said page..it scares you..Boo!!

Oh, im not gone, worry not, my friends. I just wanted to come here to tell you all that we're inching closer to half-way stage, in the painting of the book. IN fact, i wanted to wait to that very stage, to post here, but, that's still two pages (2 weeks) away and it's only fair to show you some of the progress, thus far, instead.
So, here's a finished page. The book is moving at steady pace :)
Enjoy.

updates.update_userinfo: Another scene done, here's a tease ;)
updates.update_content:
We're up to 14 pages finished, people!
Progress continues, slow and steady, towards the goal.
So, here's a teaser of yet another finished page ;)
Cheers!
Progress continues. Here's a non-spoilery finished page.

Doing the thing and book production continues on a steady pace.
Have a great week, y'all ;)
M
PS - I don't know why, but im unable to comment on the images here, so, if im not responding, please know that for some reason, im just unable to. If you have any questions, drop me a DM.

I apologize that my last update was more than 2 weeks ago. Well, i took a minor time off to recharge and enjoy the Holidays.
As it is, production continues and it is at full steam. I should wrap up page 10, this week.
So, here's a sneaky peeky ;)
Here's to a more positive 2021, to us all, Odin knows we could use it.
Just that. We have a title page, now :)

campaign.story:
THIS JUST IN:
You crushed the First Stretch Goal! THANK YOU! Now it's time for the—
NEXT STRETCH GOAL!
Holiday PANIC! ends TODAY at 7 PM PST! If we hit $14K by then, I will record a video commentary telling the stories behind the stories!
I love peeks behind the creative curtain, and have a lot to say about these stories, these characters, and Christmas stories in general. It'll be a lot of fun for all of us!
There are still some Special Rewards left. If those get snapped up, we will hit this goal easy!
We can do this!
YOU can do this!
LET'S GO!
Monday, Nov 2 was PANIC! MONDAY.
For 12 hours I offered up a ton of Special Rewards and Stretch Goals. Here are the posts from that:
PANIC MONDAY STARTS NOW! 
Each hour between 7 AM and 7 PM PST, I will offer a new deal or delight to pump up the PANIC! Generally speaking, these will be one-of-a-kind, first come, first serve.
If you've already pledged, you can MANAGE YOUR PLEDGE to upgrade and claim the new reward. 
(If you are one of the Zombie Elves or Zombie Santa and want to add one of these rewards to your existing one, please contact me directly and I will reserve the new reward— if it's still available— for you. No need to change your pledge— simply add the amount to your current pledge.)
HOUR 12
Was only planning on doing 4 Sketches, but bowed to public pressure…
HOUR 11
HOUR 10
HOUR 9
When your rendition of the Captain America Theme is a huge hit, what do you do for an encore? SPIDER-MAN!
HOUR 8
These Sketches get grabbed up faster than… well, look at that. Gone already.

HOUR 7
Is she going UP or DOWN the chimney? That's the question…
HOUR 5
That one was snatched up almost instantly. There are a couple more Sketches coming up, but only a couple…

HOUR 4
SUPERBOY! Guardian! Dubblex! And almost the entire cast of the Kamandi-inspired "Last Boy on Earth" storyline! Resistance is futile…
HOUR 3
Anyone who knows my musical ability will think this is a DISINCENTIVE to reach the goal! But this has been part of my night-time lullaby repertoire for my kids for years. It's probably only HALF-bad by now!
WE HAVE NOW PASSED THE $11,500 STRETCH GOAL! And since I am a man of my word— and no shame— I present to you, as promised, my unique vocal stylings on the Captain America Theme Song…*
PLAY

* Any change in lyrics is due to artistic license, not forgetfulness.
HOUR 2
Some people were looking for a medium-priced pledge— here it is! I'll be offering a few of these today— but only a VERY FEW! Stay tuned…
HOUR 1

YOU DID IT! THANK YOU!
(I always knew you'd do it. You— and a couple hundred of your closest friends! That's what puts the crowd in Crowdfunding!
 But it ain't over yet! This sleigh ride's just picking up speed! Because now it's time for:
You know— how some parts of a cover are shiny, while the rest of the cover isn't? That's what Spot Gloss is. It instantly makes any cover look way cooler!
And I say our book deserves it!
I know $12K is a bit of a stretch— but maybe that's why they're called Stretch Goals!
I say: we can do this! Look how much we've done already! And as a wise man in a very  nice suit said in one of my favorite movies:
"It's Christmas time, Theo! It's the time of miracles!"
2020— ONE HELL OF A YEAR, huh?
Covid. Wildfires. Protests. And don't even get me started on US politics— !
Know what we need?
Turns out, over the years— and without really intending to— I've created quite a few Christmas-related stories.
Maybe it's because I love the tradition of it— every major comics character has a Holiday story or two under their belt.
Maybe it's because I love the challenge of it— Christmas stories can so easily become overly sentimental and saccharine. 
Maybe it's because I still believe there's a place for hope in this world.
Whatever. The fact remains that many of these stories have never seen print, or were only printed in a very limited way.
Every year I mean to collect them, put them in print. It never happens.
But this year… this particular  year… after all we've been through…
I need this book to be out there.
I'd say we all need it.
A 64-PAGE TRADE PAPERBACK featuring Yuletide Tales of Tenderness and Terror!
First and most importantly: All stories are DONE! Completely completed!
The only thing I still need to draw is the COVER. Support this project and you will see that cover come together in updates documenting the process, and my thoughts behind each decision and revision! (In fact: In the very first Update you will see my half-drawn REJECTED cover!)
 YOU COULD EVEN BE ON THIS COVER! (see below.)
The book will showcase a seasonal sampler of stories featuring properties put out by Panic Button Press— my vast publishing empire— including:
THE BOOK WILL ALSO INCLUDE: 
Behind-the-scenes info and insights! 
Sketches!
Samples of Christmas Cards that I've made and sent out over the years!
BEST OF ALL: 
You will have this book by Christmas! (If you live in the USA, that is. Anywhere else, it'll probably arrive a bit after, I'm sorry to say.) I will make sure this happens. I swear by the star on the top of the tree.
BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE!
Everyone getting a physical copy of the book will also receive their very own—
A HELL of a year needs a HELL of a card. I simply can't think of a better way to cap off the (insert appropriate adjective) year we've just been through than with this card. 
My gift to you.
SAME GIFT— DIFFERENT WRAPPING!
The same 64-page HOLIDAY PANIC! book is also available with 2 ALTERNATE COVERS, each a KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE— Never Available Again!— with fantastic art by:
TOM "The Gift That Keeps on Giving" GRUMMETT
"You Better Watch Out!" is right!
DAVID "Home for the Holidays" HAHN
She Knows if She's Been Bad or Good…
Get one! Get both! GET ALL THREE! (Including the "Zombie Horde" Standard Cover— see below.) Between the Rewards and Add-Ons, you can get as many or any combination of them that you'd like! It's like Christmas-time at… well, Christmas-time!
If you agree it's been one HELL of a year, you can share that sentiment with family and friends by ordering a set (or multiple sets) of 6 SAM HELL Holiday Cards as an ADD-ON!
6 SAM HELL Holiday Cards
Blank on the inside
Envelopes included
Only $12.00
Order as many sets as you need!
Will be mailed separately; you'll have these by the first week of December, latest. Plenty of time to inflict… err, I mean: share these with others.
 WILL NOT BE OFFERED AGAIN. I mean, there's never going to be another year like this one— right?!? 
OUR HEROES SURROUNDED BY ZOMBIE SANTA, ZOMBIE ELVES, ZOMBIE CHRISTMAS SHOPPERS, ETC. That's the book's cover. See for yourself:
The Cover in its current state: rough layout.
HERE'S THE THING: I can put the likeness of FOUR BACKERS AS ZOMBIES* on this piece! So…
 YOU could be one of three Zombie Elves! Check out the ZOMBIE ELF reward level!
OR…
 YOU could be Zombie Santa! AND you'll get the COVER'S ORIGINAL ART! Check out the ZOMBIE SANTA Reward Level!
Everyone wants to be a zombie, right? But so few get to be Zombie Elves! And hardly anyone gets to be Zombie Santa!
NOW'S YOUR CHANCE!
(*NOTE:  Likenesses will be necessarily rotting and undead in appearance. Just so we're clear.)
This is a very streamlined campaign— the HOLIDAY PANIC! book, the SAM HELL card, and not much else. That's to help make sure I deliver the book to you in time for Christmas— and to help me keep my sanity! (What little of it is left!)
CAREER CARTOONIST. Too late to save me now.
Over the past 35+ years I've written, inked, and occasionally penciled just about every major comics character out there— from Superman to Superboy to Harley Quinn to Spider-man to Suicide Squad to Fantastic Four… the list goes on.
Lately I've been having even more fun working on my creator-owned comics such as SECTION ZERO, IMPOSSIBLE JONES, and SAM HELL. All thanks to people supporting those projects.
People like YOU.
Thank you.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The book is done, the printer lined up, the dates confirmed. Since the stories are already finished, everything should go smoothly. My goal is to end this year on a high note, not to add to anyone's stress or disappointment. 

Of course, things could go wrong. If things start heading south (of the north pole) you'll be the first to know. And I will do everything in my power to set matters right as quickly as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
AS OF RIGHT NOW…
…Nearly all of the Holiday PANIC! books have been mailed out!
PLAY
The Holiday PANIC! books arrived yesterday, December 11th, at about 11 AM PST…
UPS dropped these off yesterday…

All files for Holiday PANIC! have been uploaded to Mixam Printing!
Money has been sent!
The order has been CONFIRMED!

Well. I've uploaded all Holiday PANIC! files to the printer…
…And am waiting for the final amount I owe them, plus instructions on how to give them the Spot Gloss overlays, which will dictate exactly where that ultra-cool gloss will go on the cover! (All 3 covers, actually— with different things "glossed over" on each, of course!)

I've gotten a handful of messages from people who have filled out their survey, but when they hit SUBMIT, it doesn't. Very frustrating!
If this is happening to you, try doing the survey on a different device. Especially if you're doing it on your phone. Desktop is probably better. I've heard from some people that this does, indeed, solve the problem.
In Other News…
There were times I thought it would never end, but it did! Here are the finished inks for the Holiday PANIC! cover:

campaign.story:
ESC POD
Last year I was part of an Anthology project that funded here on Kickstarter, which gave me the confidence to put together a Halloween book for 2020. I have slowly accumulated 7 stories ranging from hellified to sci-fi that will shock and horrirfy. We have a diverse and talented team that hails from all over the globe that I am very proud of. We even have been fortunate enough to have had the Bram Stoker estate accept our "Dracula: Lord of the Future" story as actual Count Dracula cannon, thanks to our talented colorist/writer Chris McAuley!! 


This is absolutely an adult book, with graphic violence, and adult themes/language. There is a comedic horror story and several that are much more grim, making it a perfect Halloween Anthology purchase! 
A lot of people have worked very hard to get this volume ready for publication and I think you're going to be pleased with the end result. If we get the funding we need for this Volume, then expect #2 to be ready by October 2021!!

Luci & the Doombringers
The cover story was written, drawn & colored by Bayron Calderon, with script assistance & lettering done by Phoebe A. Xavier. It follows one of the Devil's daughters on her quest to break free from her cell in Hell and arise as a heavy metal guitar goddess on Earth. This one has both action & comedy with incredible art!
Inexorable
"Inexorable" is a tale of a thief who has crossed the wrong people at the absolute worst time. It was written by Vesa Vltlkalnen and drawn/colored by Juho Sivonen. They both hail from Finland! The story is a twisted one like many in this collection are.

One Way Ticket
Both "One Way Ticket" and "Patient Xero" were done by the same creative teams: Phillip Butehorn as writer, Juan Manuel Almiron on Lineart, Chris McAuley as colorist and Phoebe A. Xavier on letters. The first is a tale of a demon and his host on a train destined for Hell. The other is a one page pandemic tale that hits very close to home in 2020.
The Damned
Written by Juan Bertazzi , drawn by Hernan Gonzalez & colored by Chris McAuley, "The Damned" is another quick story that packs a werewolf clawed punch. Hernan & Juan hail from Argentina, while Chris represents Ireland & Canada.

ESC POD
Written and lettered by Phoebe A, Xavier, drawn by Renan Balmonte and colored by Chris McAuley, "ESC POD" is a karma slap sci-fi horror short.
Dracula - Lord of The Future
Our other sci fi horror short "Dracula - Lord of the Future" is the debut of a chapter in Dracula's epic that takes place far in the future, in a dystopian starscape. It is written and colored by Chris McAuley and drawn by the incredibly talented Collin Maxwell. This pair of Irishmen will continue the story in a one shot in the future! 

123GO!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
At this point the book is 80% done , with mostly just some coloring and lettering to be done. Several of our artists did their lineart on the promise of pay from the Kickstarter, so about 50% of our cost is going towards paying our team, while the rest goes directly to the website's fee & publishing/shipping the books to you.

I will pay my team out of pocket if I must but I really think there is an audience out there for this book.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Final Rewards and an Exciting new project
updates.update_content:
So about a month ago I sent out the final rewards packages to everyone who responded to the survey. I technically still am holding 5 copies for ppl who never responded to the survey. But in the last few weeks I hope that the following ppl got their rewards:

Jeffrey Marx   Staci Sattler    Phil Butehorn    Michael Mortimer    Austin Janowsky   Savanna Miller

As of today all 151 copies of 13th Moon Volume One have shipped out from Orlando where they were printed. If you are in the USA they should arrive no later than Monday. If you are in Canada or overseas it may take a bit longer.

People who were part of the 'Merch pack' or 'Malek pack' reward tiers, I am packaging your stuff this weekend and should be shipping it by next week. The Malek issues should deliver in about 3 weeks.

Thanks again everyone who has supported us. Here is a review of some of the design work that is happening for Volume Two.

I finally received all the funds into an account I control and am ordering the printing this week.

Shockingly I realized that a bunch of people still have not gotten their addresses to me. 
If you ordered anything physical to be delivered to you I neeeed you to get me your address.

I wanted to keep everyone in the loop about the status of this project as I have had problems getting the funds to me. I have just applied for a new account today and hope to get the physical rewards printed as soon as I can receive money to that new account. 

I sent out the digital version to all $5 level supporters last week. Then I noticed an error and remixed it. So this weekend I will send allllll of you the correct version of the pdf. People who supported at the $20 digital pack level, I will send your stuff through tonight.

Thank you all so much!

And thank my friend Tammy who both brought us to 2400 and later to the 2800 Stretch Goal so you can all get a 123GO! sticker. My other friend Tammy from Oregon also pledged twice with bigger chunks than 5 or $16, which means that nice women named Tammy did an inordinate amount of the funding this time around. Thanks to both Tammys and 165 other people!

I just want to thank everyone for getting this book funded. We'll be back next year with another excellent Halloween Anthology for you. 
It appears we'll end a bit short of the stretch goal I set after we hit 100/100 and that is A-OK. We are grateful to have gotten the book funded!
Updates will continue after this campaign funds, but this is the final post before we cross the finish line in two hours and twenty four minutes.
We have only three days to go and are just over 100%. If we somehow get to $2,800 before the campaign ends I will send every single backer a 123GO! sticker, even if they only pledged a dollar!

We’ve been getting a lot of support from other creators in the Indie comic book community so I wanted to take a moment this morning to shout out some other great books you can get on Kickstarter right now.
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/samnoir/ballyskillen-an-augmented-reality-modern-fantasy-comic-book
Ballyskillen, written by Sam Noir, is a horror book based on Irish folk lore that incorporates real animation into the digital tablet version of the issues!

campaign.story:
Wailing Blade is high-adrenaline fantasy adventure, set in the dark future of mankind.
 When his father is sentenced to death at the hands of the legendary Headtaker, bandit prince Tychon must find a way to save him, or fall to the Wailing Blade himself.
Plus, for the first time ever, you can get your hands on the... 
WAILING BLADE #1 - CREATOR'S EDITION 
And for the ULTIMATE COLLECTOR Ready to Take the Blade with both hands...
WAILING BLADE: HEADTAKER COLLECTOR'S BOX
Intrigued?
Let us tell you more about this extraordinary book!
SYNOPSES
Thousands of years after mankind’s fall from the stars, the remnants of humanity live under the brutal thumb of tyrannical rulers who wield futuristic technology that to the masses, is indistinguishable from magic.
These petty warlords squabble over the dwindling resources of a dying earth, while they themselves bow down to the Tyrant of Minturn, who crushes all who oppose him with his legendary executioners – warriors who wield the deadliest weapons from mankind’s starfaring days.
The most feared of these executioners is the Head Taker, who wields the mighty and unstoppable Wailing Blade – a sword which screams louder than the victims it beheads.
Each year, he travels the breadth of the Tyrant’s empire, dispensing justice and enforcing his will.
Standing against the Tyrant are scattered clans of bandits, like the Windcleavers.
Desperate scavengers, they defy the Tyrant by raiding his caravans, and keeping forbidden technology for themselves.
Their prince, Tychon, sees an opportunity to pluck a great prize from the Tyrant’s grasp, setting himself on a path that leads to a confrontation with death itself, and the WAILING BLADE!

Who will love Wailing Blade?
Fans of Conan, Elric, Masters of the Universe and other sword & sorcery epics.
People who like Mad Max, The Dying Earth, and other tales of dark futures.
Collectors of superior quality modern independent graphic novels from a world-class team of up-and-comers and industry veterans!
If you like your comics with tons of action, over-the-top weaponry, and mind-blowing visuals, THIS IS YOUR BOOK!
What Exactly Do You Get When You Take the Blade and Back This Campaign?
 Wailing Blade Volume 1: Headtaker is a 144-page collection in standard American comic size, on printed on high-quality paper.
 Wailing Blade Volume 1: Headtaker is available in three amazing options -- A super affordable direct market softcover edition, a ComixTribe-Exclusive "Virgin" Wrap-Around softcover trade, and a premium limited edition foil-enhanced, die-cut hardcover.
This volume collects the entire critically acclaimed mini-series originally released in the direct market in single issue format as WAILING BLADE #1-4. 
 Wailing Blade: Headtaker features a foreword written by Batman & The Outsiders and Titans writer Brian Edward Hill, who calls Wailing Blade "a beautiful, volatile reaction, a combination of medieval storytelling and visionary technology... a visionary ride that pulls you through its world." 
⚔️📜 PLUS: This Volume also includes an all-new LEGENDS OF THE WAILING BLADE collection of tavern-tales and yarns that reveal the origins of the legendary weapon, as told and illustrated by top creators in the world of indie comics! (STAY TUNED AS WE REVEAL CREATOR CONTRIBUTORS THROUGHOUT THIS CAMPAIGN!) 
 NEW COLLECTION EXCLUSIVE: This new volume contains a thrilling, never-before-published FINAL SCENE that was not included in the single issue release that fans of this series will not want to miss as it includes the first appearance of TWO more of the Tyrant's merciless EXECUTIONERS!
All backers will also receive loads of additional bonus content in the Tyrant's Cut Digital Deluxe PDF and the Wailing Blade Original Theme Heavy Metal Anthem MP3 by "Making Metal With" George O'Connor! 
 NEW! Wailing Blade #1 - CREATOR'S EDITION is an all-new, campaign exclusive printing of the smash-hit first issue, featuring a side-by-side look at acclaimed writer Rich Douek's script next to artist Joe Mulvey's immaculate black & white line art! This also includes the original Wailing Blade pitch greenlit by ComixTribe and bonus process sketches, making it a must have for writers, artists and comic book process junkies! Each book will be numbered and signed by Joe and I. (**SPECIAL ADD-ON ITEM! Can be added to ANY Pledge Level!**) 
Or take the blade to a whole new level when you get ALL FOUR NEW BOOKS plus a whole lot more in a limited edition WAILING BLADE: HEADTAKER Collector's Box! 
At highest levels, limited opportunities to get custom sketches, stories, signed materials, and the chance to be EXECUTED BY THE HEADTAKER YOURSELF! 
The Comics Industry Picked Up the Wailing Blade... and LOVES IT! Here's What Critics & Pros are Saying About This Series...

Check out More Reviews for the Book: 
"A brutally bloody take on Sci-fi/ fantasy that doesn't hold back... Wailing Blade is the Executioner Sci-Fi Fantasy You Didn’t Know You Needed..." - Geek.com
"Loved it! 5 out of 5 stars..." - TheNewestRant.com
 "A Bloody, Brutal Blend Of Fantasy & Sci-Fi..." - Comicon.com
"Wailing Blade has a swagger to it... a lot of fun and a strong start." - Omnicomic.com
"Wailing Blade is the kind of comic that Image was built on in the late 90's. " - GWW.com 
"Wailing Blade is Terminator with a touch of fantasy, Rich Douek and Joe Mulvey bring it all in this fantastic debut... engrossing and full of action..." - Thecomiclounge.com 
AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, HERE'S HOW COMIC FANS AND RETAILERS HAVE REACTED TO WAILING BLADE:
We create for the fans, and the fans help us create, which is why we're here!  
Feast Your Eyes on These Pages Inside the Book...
Wailing Blade features breathtaking fantasy vistas... a vivid, dangerous dark future world you've never scene before, as depicted in this scene from WAILING BLADE #1:
Some of the most brutal, bloody fight sequences ever committed to the comic book page, as in this scene here from WAILING BLADE #2:
And one of the biggest, action-set showdowns between TWO fearsome executioners, the unstoppable HEADTAKER vs. the merciless BONEBREAKER, shown here in WAILING BLADE #4: 
Want to See Even More Before You Take the Blade?
We are SO CONFIDENT in our book and believe that if you TAKE THE BLADE you won't want to let go, which is why we're making the entire, extra-sized issue WAILING BLADE #1 available for you absolutely free! 
If you'd like to read even more of Wailing Blade before you back this campaign, we invite you to download THE ENTIRE Oversized FIRST ISSUE absolutely FREE!
⚔️ CLICK HERE TO GET WAILING BLADE #1 FOR FREE ⚔️  
 Who are the Creators Behind the Screaming Blood-soaked Thrill Ride That is Wailing Blade? 
Wailing Blade is an action-packed, dystopian future fever dream created by Rich Douek (Road of Bones, Sea of Sorrows) and Joe Mulvey (SCAM).
Rich Douek
Rich is an award-winning copywriter, and the creator of the independent comic series, Gutter Magic. He has worked on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Universe comics for IDW, and has published short stories in the New York Times-featured All We Ever Wanted anthology, for A Wave Blue World, as well as anthologies for Comixtribe and Red Stylo press. Additonally, he is a moderator of the Comics Experience Creator's Workshop, where he strives to help newer creators learn how to create their own comics and navigate the industry.
Joe Mulvey
Joe made his comics debut as the writer and illustrator of the electrifying super-powered Vegas heist series Scam, from ComixTribe. He is also the writer, artist and creator of the acclaimed children's book Mummy's Always Right, and was published in the Where We Live Anthology from Image Comics. His next series, Happy Hill, will be published by ComixTribe soon! 
Christopher Sotomayor
Chris has been a mainstay at Marvel and DC Comics since 1996 working on titles like Captain America, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Nightwing, Detective Comics, SuperGirl and pretty much everything else at one point or another.  In addition to working for every major comic publisher in the business, Chris also teaches a course on digital coloring for comics at http://www.comicsexperience.com.  Stay in school. Don't do drugs.
Taylor Esposito
Taylor is a comic book lettering professional and owner of Ghost Glyph Studios. As a staff letterer at DC, he lettered titles such as Red Hood and The Outlaws, Constantine, Bodies, CMYK, and New Suicide Squad. Prior to this, Taylor was credited on numerous titles for Marvel as a production artist. He is currently working on a new batch of creator-owned titles, such as Interceptor: Reactor and Friendo (Vault Comics), Exorsisters and Jook Joint (Image), and Babyteeth (Aftershock). Other publishers he has worked with include Line Webtoon (Acursian, Finality) Dynamite (Battlestar Galactica, Rainbow Brite, Army of Darkness/Bubba Ho-Tep), and IDW (Scarlett’s Strike Force).
Rich writes:
For me, growing up, my favorite books were the ones that transported me to different lands. Wild adventures I could get lost in as I followed the heroes along on their journey. Middle Earth, Hyboria, The Young Kingdoms, The Dying Earth. To me, it's not escapism to want to dwell in worlds like that for a little while. The wonderful thing about fiction, especially genre fiction is that it gives you a taste of the impossible - a window into another world. And that feeling, that exhilarating feeling of cracking open a book and getting lost in it, even for a moment, is something that I've always wanted to create for someone else. And I believe that Wailing Blade is a book that will.
It's often said that you should make the comics that you want to see in the world. In that respect, Wailing Blade is everything we've ever wanted to see in a comic. It's got action, it's got adventure. Compelling characters, and a lush, vibrant world for them to inhabit. We couldn't be happier to share it with you.
What Exactly Is This Kickstarter For?
The team has already invested tens of thousands of dollars and thousands of man-hours into the development of this first WAILING BLADE series.
The WAILING BLADE COLLECTION issue is 100% complete and ready to print.
With your support here on Kickstarter, we can truly create the most incredible foil-enhanced, die-cut hardcover edition possible, while also offering some more affordable softcover and digital editions so all fans of hard-hitting dark sci-fi comics can TAKE THE BLADE! 
CHECK OUT THESE INCREDIBLE REWARDS!
ADD-ONS
 Want to customize your pledge and add a few more goodies?

Project Budget
Your support on Kickstarter will help us cover the large cost of printing and shipping thousands of books around the globe.
WAILING BLADE PROJECT TIMELINE
The Kickstarter Campaign: Oct 20 - Nov 20
Kickstarter Funds Received: Dec 4
Wailing Blade Vol 1 to Print: Early December
Merchandise in Production: December 
Book Manufacturing and Freight: (December/January)
Extra Buffer Time for Unexpected Issues: (Late January)
Expected Deliver to US Backers: (Mid February)
Expected Deliver for INT Backers: (March)
BACK WITH CONFIDENCE, BECAUSE COMIXTRIBE ALWAYS DELIVERS! 
We've built our comics business by always delivering for thousands of backers like you. 
This launch will be no different, as we look forward to serving long-time fans and first-time readers alike!
THIS BLADE IS SHARP, SO HERE'S HOW WE'LL PROTECT IT IN TRANSIT!
As Kickstarter fans and collector's ourselves, we know there's nothing worse than backing a comic project and then having your rewards arrive damaged.
After consulting with our backers, we've revamped our shipping practices to ensure your comics and collectibles arrive in great condition.
All books shipped will be secured in Gemini Comic Supply Comic Flash Mailers, which provides impact-resistant protection.
Orders with multiple comics will be sandwich packed and secured for additional protection.
And our Wailing Boxes will be BUBBLE WRAPPED before being inserted into a second shipping box, so that it arrives in great condition.
Thank you so much for taking the time to check out our project. We would be absolutely thrilled if you're ready to take the next step and join this campaign!
Will YOU Be the Next to Take the Blade?
If you've made it this far, you may be ready to be the very next person to TAKE THE BLADE!
If so, we'd like to ask you to scroll back up this page, choose an awesome reward, and pledge to be a part of this campaign today.
On behalf of the entire Wailing Blade team, thank you so much for your support!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The support of backers on Kickstarter has been instrumental to the success of ComixTribe since our very first project back in 2012.

Our success would not have been possible without the support of thousands of backers like you over the years, many who have come back launch after launch to support us...

So you better believe we take the trust of our backers very seriously.

We've taken a number of actions to mitigate risk associated with this campaign, including completing the creation of the book prior to launching and establishing a strong relationship with a quality printer who has done great work for us in the past and known for a hands on attention to detail and quality craftsmanship.

Every Kickstarter campaign comes with risks, unforeseen hiccups, and lessons learned...and we've certainly learned valuable lessons from every past campaign.

During this time of global uncertainty, we realize that steady communication with our backers throughout the campaign and fulfillment process is key... and should any unforeseen issues cause delays, our backers will be the first to know.

We're committed to delivering a superior reward delivery experience for our backers, so we're investing in the best protective shipping materials for comics and collectibles, and handling fulfillment 100% in-house, to eliminate the risk of delivery delays and to make sure your pledges arrive in great condition.

ComixTribe and the WAILING BLADE team have a long track record of delivering the goods, and the fact that we enjoy so much support from returning backers is testament to that.

So we invite you to back with confidence, as we want to be entertaining you for years to come.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: 99% Shipped! Blades are Landing All Over!
updates.update_content:
Hey, friends! 
Just wanted to jump in and let you know that we're now 99% shipped! We have a few backers who's shipping addresses are incomplete that we're trying to verify, but just about everything is already out the door and arriving to you all!

updates.update_userinfo: Don't you just love it when a plan comes together!
updates.update_content: This never gets old!!!

updates.update_userinfo: Let the WAILING BLADE Book Shipping Commence!
updates.update_content:
Hey, Wailing Bladers! 
We have the news you've been waiting for! 
WAILING BLADE Volume 1 Hardcovers & Softcovers have arrived at our warehouse and are starting to ship!

updates.update_userinfo: Unexciting Update... But Some Cool Art!
updates.update_content:
Hey, Wailing Bladers! 
We hoped to have a big shipping update for you by now, but we're more or less in the same spot we were two weeks ago.  We were hoping books would be unloaded through the ports and cleared right through customs and into the hands of our warehouse for shipping out to you all by now... but our latest check in says they're still waiting to get through the log-jam that is the Chicago ports.

Hey, friends and Wailing Bladers! 
It's been a little quiet over here as we've been getting ducks in a row while waiting for books to arrive from overseas. Last time we told you that first week in April was the updated arrival time, but our printer said there's a chance they could be arriving this week or early next... fingers crossed!
In the meantime, we've shipped out:

Hey, friends! We wanted to jump into your inbox and keep you posted on all things WAILING BLADE Kickstarter, but first we wanted to share some awesome news! 
Two of our favorite ComixTribe creators Rich Douek (writer of Wailing Blade) and Alex Cormack (artist of SINK) have been received the awesome honor of having their IDW horror series ROAD OF BONES advance to the final ballot of the BRAM STOKER AWARDS for Superior Achievement in a Graphic Novel!
Hey, Wailing Blade backers! Check out these pics just in from the factory!

updates.update_userinfo: We're Upgrading Your Books! Take a Look!
updates.update_content:
Hey, Wailing Blade fam, happy 2021!
We just wanted to hop on and share some good news with you all, now that the WAILING BLADE: Headtaker books are in the process of being printed up.
In the process of finalizing the book with our printer, we were able to get a better than expected quote on the total order, as well as raise additional funding from backers upgrading their pledges when filling out their Crowdox Surveys.

updates.update_userinfo: TODAY! WAILING BLADE Digital Rewards Unleashed!
updates.update_content: Hey, friends! Great news... Your WAILING BLADE Digital Rewards will be dropping TODAY!

updates.update_userinfo: Suvey's Are LIVE! Adds-Ons Will Help Unlock This...
updates.update_content:
Hey, WAILING BACKERS...
SURVEYS ARE LIVE! 
 CLICK HERE TO ACCESS YOUR WAILING BLADE SURVEY 
Surveys should have hit your inboxes a few hours ago, but if you missed them, you can always click the link above and access them using your Kickstarter email address.
ADD-ON TO YOUR PLEDGE AND UNLOCK MORE PAGES TO THE WAILING BLADE COLLECTION!

project_data.project_name: Wailing Blade V1: Headtaker - Dark Sci-Fi Fantasy Hardcover

campaign.story:
Hi, I'm Justin Jordan, one of the co-creators along with John Amor of the Webtoon series Urban Animal. This my first webcomic, and it's been both more fun and a bigger success than I've ever imagined.

If you're new to Urban Animal, and given that a lot of people know me from my work at Image Comics on things like Luther Strode, Spread, Dead Body Road and Reaver, it's about a normal kid who finds out he's not so normal when he turns into a sabertooth tiger. Things just get stranger for Joe from there. Much, much stranger.

Urban Animal is fun, funny, action packed, and I think if you dig my other stuff you'll dig it too, since I think it's one of the best things I've ever done. You can check it out online at Webtoon but now we're bringing it to print.

I wanted to thank everyone for reading the book and for checking out this Kickstarter. We're super proud and very grateful to be able to finally bring our little beast to print.
- Justin

Meet Joe Gomez. He’s got high school on lock – good grades, a cool band, and girls digging his vibe. But just when he’s got the world figured out, he goes and turns into a saber-toothed tiger. A shape-shifting nature spirit known as a Chimera, to be specific. Now Joe needs every single one of his new powers to help save the human race – whether he wants to or not.
Urban Animal is an ongoing webcomic on LINE Webtoon with nearly half a million subscribers. This is your chance to be the first to get your hands on the reformatted print edition of volume 1, which collects chapters 1 through 27 of Urban Animal - approximately 200 pages of content!
The goal of the Kickstarter is to get the comic into your hands as quickly as possible! The more we raise, the more content goes in the book, the more stretch goals are unlocked, and the more add ons we can offer. We'll reveal the stretch goal that's available to hit next, and when it unlocks, we'll reveal the next one. Ditto with the add ons, and we think everyone will be pleasantly surprised with each!


So, what am I getting for my pledge? First, all backers at the $24 Urban Animal Volume 1 Graphic Novel level will get the collected edition, printed at 5.7"x8.2" with a matte finish wrap around cover. Each page of the comic will be carefully reformatted to provide the same quality of reading experience many of you have already had online. 

 Scroll down for more pages! 







Read the full announcement here!
Read the full announcement here!
Read the full announcement here!
Read the full announcement here!
Read the full announcement here!








 Please note that shipping costs are not included in your pledge. We are working with CRWN on fulfillment services and you will pay actual shipping depending on your region and the size of your order during the BackerKit survey phase.
Please see our FAQ for more details around shipping costs.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There is little risk in that this book is being published and the art has been completed. The team running the Kickstarter have worked with the vendors and printers before and have confidence in the quality and timeline we've outlined. However, during production mistakes can happen and some of the vendors are overseas. Should something not arrive in time or as expected we will quickly communicate that to all backers and let everyone know when to expect items should dates shift.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: HALL OF FAME
support.descp: Get drawn into THE TRAP! Get yourself or a loved one immortalized in THE TRAP. You must provide adequate photo reference. Also included is 1 copy of the oversized, deluxe format hardcover with a limited edition signed bookplate by Briggs and Higgins, plus ALL THREE original prints from Elsa Charretier, Rod Reis and Declan Shalvey

support.title: LUCID DREAMS *NEW*
support.descp:
Dreaming Awake? 2020 is one helluva year! Due to the popularity of the Superstitious tier, backers will get EVERYTHING. That's right, you get your digital bundle, printed bundle AND a PRIVATE 45 minute Tarot Reading via Zoom in November!

support.title: OUR UNDYING LOVE
support.descp: Want to support the cause without a need for a reward? Pledge here and we'll keep you posted on the progress of the project from beginning to end!

support.title: BURIED BUT NOT DEAD (Digital Copy)
support.descp: Receive a DMR-Free PDF copy of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD that you may enjoy on your favorite e-reading device!

support.title: BURIED BUT NOT DEAD (Free US Shipping!)
support.descp: This is it! Get a copy of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD with FREE SHIPPING anywhere in the continental USA! Includes *ALL* Stretch Goals we unlock in this 15 day campaign, too!

support.title: BURIED BUT NOT DEAD (International)
support.descp: International friends! This will get you a copy of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD -- including all the Stretch Goals we unlock -- with no additional shipping charges regardless of any craziness that happens with shipping costs here in the United States. $35 out the door and the book is coming your way -- guaranteed!

support.title: Triple Threat (BURIED + Any Two Add-Ons)
support.descp: Want a copy of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD and to fill-in any missing books in your collection? Or perhaps do a little early holiday shopping and get some cool graphic novels as gifts for friends? Pledge here to get a copy of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD and *ANY TWO* other Dirk Manning graphic novels listed in the "Add-Ons" graphics at one super-discounted bundled price! And yes, you still get FREE SHIPPING! Treat yo'self, or perhaps some friends!

support.title: RETAIL BUNDLE (5x Free Shipping)
support.descp: There is no immediate plans for this book to be released in the Direct Market anytime soon, but I appreciate my comic shops friends who support my work. If you're a store owner who wants copies of this book for your shelves and customers, pledge here to get FIVE copies of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD -- with FREE SHIPPING! Each book will also come with any/all Stretch Goal upgrades we unlock, too! FREE SHIPPING! This is a deep discount to thank you for your support!

support.title: MEGA RETAILER BUNDLE (10x Free Shipping)
support.descp: There is no immediate plans for this book to be released in the Direct Market anytime soon, but I appreciate my comic shops friends who support my work. If you're a store owner who wants copies of this book for your shelves and customers, pledge here to get TEN copies of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD -- with FREE SHIPPING! Each book will also come with any/all Stretch Goal upgrades we unlock, too! FREE SHIPPING, too! This is an even deeper discount to thank you for your support!

support.title: GIMME EVERYTHING! (I said EVERYTHING!)
support.descp: Pledging here gets you EVERY BOOK offered at a super-discounted price: You'll get BURIED BUT NOT DEAD, NIGHTMARE WORLD Volumes 1-4, TALES OF MR. RHEE Volumes 1-4, LOVE STORIES (TO DIE FOR), HOPE, HAUNTED HIGH-ONS, and WRITE OR WRONG: A WRITER'S GUIDE TO CREATING COMICS. That's 13 FULL-LENGTH GRAPHIC NOVELS (well, 12 graphic novels and a prose book about comics) for $10 a pop with FREE SHIPPING in the USA. The average 22-page comic costs about $4 an issue these days, and this is over 1,500 pages of content for less than $10 per 120-pages. (minimum) Do the math, friends. Fill some holes in your collection, treat yourself to a bunch of new books, and/or gift some out to friends who love horror and want to be a comic book writer! They'll love ya' for it. (Overseas friends, add $50 for shipping for this massive box of books!)

support.title: SPACE CADETS COLLECTION COLLECTION Deal!
support.descp: There is no immediate plans for this book to be released in the Direct Market anytime soon, but I appreciate my comic shops friends who support my work... especially you, Jen King of SPACE CADETS COLLECTION COLLECTION! You asked for it, so you're getting it: Pledge here to get TWENTY copies of BURIED BUT NOT DEAD -- with FREE SHIPPING! Each book will also come with any/all Stretch Goal upgrades we unlock, too! FREE SHIPPING, too! (If you're not Jen King of SPACE CADETS COLLECTION COLLECTION but want in on this super-special offer, message us and we'll talk.)

support.title: The Dirk Manning Mystery Box
support.descp: I know, I know: I said this was an "All Thrills, No Frills" campaign... but this is the lone exception. Pledging for one of the three "Mystery Boxes" will get you EVERYTHING in the campaign (see: "Gimme Everything")... and more. Much, much more. Your Mystery Box will be catered to your interests based on a super-secret survey and include some super-special mystery goodies, many of which are super-rare and/or even one of a kind. We're talking variant covers, slabbed comics, and other goodies directly from my personal vault. Pledge here if you really want to help "Kickstart" this campaign knowing you'll more than get your investment back out of this pledge level, friends. Free shipping anywhere in the world on this one, too!

This tier includes the ‘GUNMETAL – Ltd. Edition Variant' of THOMAS RIVER #1, plus a digital copy of the comic to read on your computer or mobile device.
The cover to this book will be printed via a special process on an actual brushed aluminum metal sheet. Art by Brian Stelfreeze. Please note that the art shown is a representation of the cover.
Includes:
• THOMAS RIVER #1, ‘GUNMETAL – Ltd. Edition Variant' Comic Book
• Digital THOMAS RIVER #1 Comic Book
SHIPPING WILL BE ADDED DURING CHECKOUT. This is being done to keep costs as low as possible.

(the Blank Cover will be white, with just the logo and trade dress).

support.title: BE DRAWN INTO THE ‘THOMAS RIVER’ COMIC!
support.descp:
How cool is this?!? You’ll email a few photos of yourself for reference, and Brian will draw YOU into the actual THOMAS RIVER comic book! You could be a police officer, a goon working for the mob, a terrorist, or just a person on the street (Brian’s choice). You’ll also be credited in the book for your role as an ‘extra’ in the comic.
On top of that, you will receive an 11" x 17" Artist's Proof print (1 of 1) of the page where your character is featured, signed and numbered by Brian. Also, you will be credited by name on the Inside Front Cover of the comic for your "role" as a character in the story.

Includes:
• Brian Stelfreeze will draw a character to your likeness in at least one panel of the book.
• 11" x 17" Artist's Proof print (1 of 1) of the page where your character is featured, signed and numbered by Brian.
• THOMAS RIVER #1, 40 page "Cover A" Comic Book, Signed by both Stelfreeze & Wagner.
• Digital THOMAS RIVER #1 Comic Book
SHIPPING ADDED DURING CHECKOUT

support.title: BRZRKR softcovers
support.descp:
Go BRZRK by reading the complete story of BRZRKR in a beautiful 3 volume graphic novel softcover set.
Each graphic novel is a full color, 7”x10”, and 128 page softcover (384 pages total!). Each graphic novel will ship individually as it is completed and released. Volume 1 estimated delivery September 2021, Volume 2 estimated delivery April 2022, and Volume 3 estimated delivery September 2022.
Shipping will be charged afterwards by CrowdOx.
INCLUDES:
BRZRKR Volume 1 graphic novel softcover edition
BRZRKR Volume 2 graphic novel softcover edition
BRZRKR Volume 3 graphic novel softcover edition

support.title: "Platinum Immortal" signed boxed set
support.descp:
For the truly BRZRK, nothing beats this ultimate “Platinum Immortal” exclusive limited edition deluxe boxed set which comes with a Kickstarter exclusive print signed by Keanu Reeves, Matt Kindt, & Ron Garney. This set arrives with BRZRKR graphic novels 1, 2, & 3 in the Kickstarter exclusive, limited edition deluxe slipcased hardcover format along with an ultra-limited edition “platinum” metal box worthy of the immortal BRZRKR! Each hardcover will feature cover artwork not available on any other edition. The Kickstarter exclusive print will feature an exclusive image by Ron Garney, never to be printed elsewhere, screen printed on 7”x10” premium paper ideal for framing & display.
The “platinum” metal box will ship with Volume 1 & hold all 3 volumes. The Kickstarter exclusive signed print will also ship with Volume 1. Please see other boxed sets for additional format & shipping details.
Only 50 of these boxed sets will be made available.
Shipping will be charged afterwards by CrowdOx.
INCLUDES:
BRZRKR Volume 1 exclusive, limited edition slipcased hardcover
BRZRKR Volume 2 exclusive, limited edition slipcased hardcover
BRZRKR Volume 3 exclusive, limited edition slipcased hardcover
BRZRKR limited edition, collectible “platinum” box
Kickstarter exclusive signed print

support.title: Appear in BRZRKR + "Platinum Immortal"
support.descp:
You cannot get more BRZRK than making an official cameo in the comic books and graphic novels. Fans who pre-order this tier will have their likeness drawn into an issue of BRZRKR, their name mentioned in a caption or word balloon, and have their own line of dialogue in the issue in which they appear. Claim your immortality!
This tier also includes the ultimate “Platinum Immortal” exclusive limited edition deluxe boxed set which comes with a Kickstarter exclusive print signed by Keanu Reeves, Matt Kindt, and Ron Garney. All other details match the "Platinum Immortal" tier.
Only 5 lucky fans will have the opportunity to be immortalized in BRZRKR!
Shipping will be charged afterwards by CrowdOx.
INCLUDES:
BRZRKR Volume 1 exclusive, limited edition slipcased hardcover
BRZRKR Volume 2 exclusive, limited edition slipcased hardcover
BRZRKR Volume 3 exclusive, limited edition slipcased hardcover
BRZRKR limited edition, collectible “platinum” box

A cameo appearance in an issue of BRZRKR

support.title: Insider Art Postcard
support.descp: As a thank-you for supporting this wonderful initiative, you'll receive a luminous Insider Art postcard of our front cover that's perfect for wall framing or under a fridge magnet to remind you to try one of the many delicious recipes from our kitchen chapter.

support.title: Insider Art Loot Bag
support.descp: The Insider Art Loot Bag includes 2 postcards, 3 vinyl cat stickers and three 1" badges/pins. Once adorned, your laptops, skateboard decks and jackets will instantly level up thanks to our top quality Insider Art Custom Merch.

support.title: Insider Art Softcover
support.descp: This is it! All 270 pages of comics, prose, crafts and games for countless hours of reading and crafting fun. Plus: your name will be listed in a special thank-you section in the back of the book.

support.title: Insider Art Softcover + Loot Bag
support.descp: Get both the softcover and loot bag and save five bucks. Plus your name in the special thank-you section.

support.title: 2-copy deal - 1 for you, 1 for your BFF
support.descp: You'll love it so much you'll want a friend to have a copy too! Plus, if you like, both of your names will see print in the thank-you section. Makes a great gift! Both copies will be sent in one package to one address.

support.title: Insider Art Librarian/Retailer Bundle
support.descp: If you're a retailer or a librarian, this is the DEAL for you! Buy 3 copies and get 2 free! Make sure you always have a copy or two on hand to circulate/sell. Plus a special thank-you to you and your store or library in the thank-you section.

support.descp:
THE O.Z. writer David Pepose has more than a decade of comics industry experience, including serving as Newsarama's Reviews Editor as well as being nominated for Best Writer in the 2018 Ringo Awards, alongside industry heavyweights like Tom King, Neil Gaiman, Jason Aaron, and Jeff Lemire.
Here's your chance to pick David's brain for one hour via Skype. Want notes on your pitch or script? Need help finding artists, or getting started on your first book? Or want advice navigating comic news sites? You set the agenda! You'll also receive all rewards from the "All Four Covers (Signed)" tier!
INCLUDES:
Skype session with David Pepose
FOUR print copies of THE O.Z. #1 (ALL FOUR COVERS)
Signed by David Pepose
PDF of THE O.Z. #1 Kickstarter Edition
PDF of David Pepose's script
Digital files of inks and colors for THE O.Z. #1
PDF of the Ringo Award-nominated SPENCER & LOCKE #1
PDF of the critically acclaimed GOING TO THE CHAPEL #1
Thanks in the credits

INCLUDES:
Original Art Commission from Ruben Rojas
FOUR print copies of THE O.Z. #1 (ALL FOUR COVERS)

The O.Z. Sketch Card by Ruben Rojas

campaign.story:
"A Dream of A Thousand Stars" by Alberto Rayo and Sebastian Carrillo.
Latin America as we know it was born 500 years ago. What will it be like in 500 more? 
MAÑANA: Latine Comics From The 25th Century is the first sci-fi comics anthology from P&M Press! Set throughout Latin America in the 2490s, MAÑANA presents readers with a radical array of futures, ranging from post-apocalypse, to liberationist utopia, to slice-of-life magical realism. The book is 270+ pages long with a B&W interior, and features 27 young-adult stories by Latine creators throughout the US and Latin America. 
"El futuro es nuestro." The future is ours.
"Woven" by Desiree Rodriguez and Naomi Franquiz.
América Latina como la conocemos nació hace 500 años. ¿Cómo será en 500 más?
MAÑANA: Comícs Latines del Siglo 25 es la primera antología de comícs de ciencia ficción de P&M Press. Ambientada en América Latina en la década de 2490, MAÑANA presenta a los lectores una gama de futuros radicales, desde el postapocalipsis, hasta la utopía liberacionista, hasta el realismo mágico. El libro tiene más de 270 páginas con un interior en blanco y negro, y presenta 27 historias para adultos jóvenes, hechas por creadores Latines en los Estados Unidos y América Latina. Para más asistencia ó preguntas en Español, mandanos un mensaje aquí. 
El futuro es nuestro!
"A Sea Change" by Alex Hernandez and Jemma Salume.
MAÑANA features the work of 50 Latine and Latin American creators, representing Cuba, Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, Mexico, Brazil, Chile, El Salvador, Argentina, Colombia, Honduras, and Peru:
A. Cole and Fawn Prince • Alberto Rayo and Sebastian Carrillo • Alex Hernandez and Jemma Salume • Andres D. Bravo • Ashley Gallagher and Mar Julia • Desiree Rodriguez and Naomi Franquiz • H. Pueyo and Dante Luiz • Hernán Guarderas and Rosa Cólon Guerra • Jamila Rowser and Maddi Gonzalez • Joamette Gil (editor) • John J. Pérez and Beli de la Torre • Juliette G.M.M. López • Julio Anta and Anastasia Longoria • Kat Fajardo • Kayla Moore and Yury Guzman • Leonardo Faierman and Richard Zela • Malka Older and Gabriela Maria Palomo • Matías Julio and Fanfi • Mirelle Ortega (cover) • Omar Morales and Nic Touris • Paloma Hernando and Gabriela Gutiérrez • Rico Taveras and Lonnie Garcia • Ryan Estrada and Ana Hinojosa • Sylvia Artiga and Andrea Rosales • Taiyari • Terry Blas and Andrea Rosales • Tristan J. Tarwater and Molly Mendoza • Victor Santiago and Rodrigo Reyes Rico.
"Carnaval" by Rico Taveras and Lonnie Garcia.
Every single cent of our budget is earmarked for paying our creators a fair page rate and producing the best quality books, rewards, and experience for you – the backers!
"Bats and Fish" by Tristan J. Tarwater and Molly Mendoza.
We've teamed up with an extraordinary group of Latine illustrators to create limited edition and one-of-a-kind rewards beyond the book itself, including a digital wallpaper by Mirelle Ortega, a full-color bookplate by Molly Crabapple, and original oil paintings by María Solias.
Rewards also include the full Power & Magic Press catalog of stocked titles (Ignatz, Prism, and Lambda nominated comics), all queer-created and BIPOC-created!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The book is about 70% complete, so we're on track to head to the printer this winter. As with all publishing endeavors (especially during a pandemic), the risk of shipping delays is always there. This year we've partnered with White Squirrel fulfillment for safe warehousing and package handling. This is our FIFTH Kickstarter campaign in as many years, and we always deliver!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Greetings backers! Checking in as promised with a status update:
In February, we finally found and contracted a team of amazing translators (a collective of natively Spanish-speaking professionals with many years of experience, based in Mexico and Seattle)! They'll be working on translating MAÑANA through March and April.
We also engaged a new print coordinator/prepress technician! She will be working with us starting next week to take all our work and turn it into a physical product. Rough estimate for hitting "go" on the printer is mid-May.
That's all for now! Stay safe and well, everyone!

WE DID IT, BACKERS! 
Thank you so much for making this campaign truly amazing! We came within $2k of our highest earning Kickstarter (HEARTWOOD) during a time when far less support would have made total sense. Everyone is struggling in their own ways and fighting more battles than usual in their day to day lives, and the fact that you all turned up for our dream of inclusive comics in the midst of everything else that is going on is not lost on us. From the bottom of our hearts, we thank you!

updates.update_userinfo: Check your email for Mañana Survey Reminder!
updates.update_content:
Mañana's the day, backers! 
We've got 27 hours left on Kickstarter! Thanks to you, we've raised over $68,000, surpassing our base goal by nearly $20k! In addition to unlocking both digital and print Spanish-language editions, we've raised creator pay from $107/pg to $117/pg and need less than $500 to unlock a SECOND bonus comic (this time by Breena Nuñez)!
